keyPolicies.policyDescription: Priority to stop a Corbyn-led Remainer alliance and a rigged second referendum. Promise not to extend the transition period beyond 2020 and to do a free trade deal that does not involve any political entanglement with the EU.
Seeking democratic reforms to make Parliament serve the people.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Tactical voting consideration to prevent a Corbyn-led Labour and to take the fight to Corbyn's Labour in the Brexit heartlands.

issues.brexitEurope: Priority to stop a Corbyn-led Remainer alliance and a rigged second referendum. Not extending transition period beyond 2020. A free trade deal without political entanglement with the EU.
issues.governance: Parliament's betrayal of the Brexit vote proves the political system is broken. Need for democratic reforms to make Parliament serve the People.
